alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 5:45AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Light snow showers will continue this morning... Scattered to numerous light snow showers have developed across portions of northeastern and central Nevada this morning. As of 530am, Nevada Department of Transportation webcams and remote weather platforms are showing light snow on area roadways with minor accumulations of an inch or two. Some of the higher passes and summits, including Connors Pass, Hickison Summit, and Austin Summit are seeing several inches or more. This is causing slick and slushy driving conditions this morning. If venturing out, please use caution while driving. Roadways could be slush covered and slippery. Please drive to arrive at your destination safely. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
